title: HomeKit Weekly: Eve Motion Blinds create the smart home environment that we’ve been dreaming of for decades
content:
I get to test many HomeKit devices, and my family is used to new devices coming in and out of the Home app. Still, the reviewer’s kit for the Eve Motion Blinds gives me insights into a high-end HomeKit future with custom integrators.

more…

The post HomeKit Weekly: Eve Motion Blinds create the smart home environment that we’ve been dreaming of for decades appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new Eve Motion Blinds levels up your HomeKit functionality in your home by letting HomeKit control your window coverings.
